attributes.action: immediately change the rules so that BBC Licence Tax Payments may ONLY be used in the production of programmes for transmission and NOT for the payment of compensation or legal bills or fines arising out of illegal acts by BBC employees and programme makers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: BBC directors continue to view the licence tax-payer with disdain and STILL use us as a cash cow to pay compensation or their fines when they commit illegal acts in our name.  This MUST be stopped and these people MUST be made to pay for the consequences of their own acts.
